column5: So this is how democracy dies cough cough with thunderous applause.
Right on bro, wishing more people had a sensical view of this whole thing.   But really it is Illuminati lol.
Already did they only make it worse everyone knows that.
Idk kinda I might jump soon.  Im tired of my group stalkers.
Yeah that is death though you just stop exsisting.

It's lots of different groups.  It is lots of different why's.  For the people doing this it's an addictive game "they" enjoy others suffering.  
Some might be sadist others believe the victim deserves it.
Your going to have to filter through all the BS to understand what's going on.
Not in my experience takes a lot longer than a day.
Bullshit and psychosis is after days or weeks of being awake and having a mental snap not like you just smoke and bamn psychosis.
Basically all GS so you do believe some form of GS exists?
Who said anything about shadow governments?
Oh also this would be the funnest shit to do to someone who is high on meth while I smoke my meth.

That's such a good question actually.  I have some serious input on that.  So first off I won't lie I  have used meth before though not for years, I had one summer I really went on a bender though.  This was a couple years ago and included some lsd and shroom use at the same time.  So here is the next part I get GS.  Also it started around the same time all feels like it started that summer.  So I don't get v2k I don't get the government sattelites or helicopters or whatever right.  The shit I have gotten is mobbed, followed, street theatre, brighted, chased yes chased in my truck I flipped out literally hundred miles an hour crazy shit.  I had a lot of NLP shit used on me to instill triggers to the brighting and mobbing to make it more intense.  I became after some unfortunate events homeless.  That's when shit got bad with the GS.  I was still doing speed off and on while being homeless.  I would get vehicle mobbed at night, caravans of vehicles horn honks car alarms keys jingled. It's all stuff that a small to large group of ordinary people could pull off.  With the drugs and the no home and the constant harrasment I started to lose my grip with reality.  I think that v2k could be real but most of the people I see talk about it seem schizophrenic.  Directional speakers are real though.  Basically picture a hundred kids who know someone is into conspiracy theory a little paranoid and high on drugs and they decide to GS him.  Maybe he goes crazy maybe he starts running. I was a crazy runner a few nights I know they loved it.  To me I was running for my life I thought I would be murdered still might. I actually had fun with this mad run rabbit run game some of the time.  Im tired of it now though.  It has died down a lot.  The cars the people that did it though that still do it won't forget me.  I will always be a game piece a pokemon.  So maybe GS is real or maybe it isn't but a small group of people can make it real for someone and no one can deny that.  Millions of people have heard about GS your telling me that out of all those millions some haven't tried to do it to someone?  It's social puppeting it's fun it's trending.
Well it's not 99 percent.

Yeah this is in my opinion a lot of what many go through.  This is essentially how female psychopaths get their needs fulfilled, by social manipulations.  Like bullying someone to suicide using your little click/cult.
So true.  Also consider psychopaths and narcissist's would jump on board with any group or cause that gives them power.  Any group that would allow them to feed narcissistic supply.

It's about how this game works and it is a game.  If your a TI you've been labeled something behind your back.  Now because of that people feel justified in persecuting you like in The Scarlet Letter.
It's like walking around with something on your forehead you just don't know it.  TI is synonymous with universal scapegoat.  
The world is run by psychopaths who realize people are figuring out all the wickedness they have created.
If your someone pointing out deplorable crimes in high places your dangerous.  Society has become fractionated, polorized and generally dumbed down.
So let the games begin.
Yeah directional sound is legit though you can purchase those speakers on Amazon.  I have wondered if you could hook something like that up to a drone.

I don't think it's the government directly, there might be different groups out there doing this on their own.  Some of it is literally people who read about GS and decided to copy it and do this to people.  I think it likely some groups and people do get paid to do this but more of a revenge for hire type service. 
  That's maybe the easiest for most people to believe.  I've had the directional sound used on me when I was outside combined with weird mentions in days prior about psychic activity in my area.  I connected the mentioning by numerous people of "psychic activity," or something similar about reading minds.   I Just went oh I get it someone is messing with me.  First the mentioning by someone then later the use of directional sound.  
So it's mind games they want you to believe it's more than it is.  I think David Lawson comes the closest to getting it right from what I have read.  
What I really think is it's a game a lot of people are playing.

It is maybe not even happening for many.  It could be mental illness where someone latches
onto gangstalking after going online and reading about it.  Have you ever wondered if some people see gangstalking online and decide to go try doing it to someone.  Then there are people being stalked for revenge probably by someone they know.  There are numerous vigilante justice groups out there.  
  This is a game first and foremost. I don't think this is as complex or organized as most of the claims. It's people having fun at someone else's expense.
  It's easy to be stalked like this and then think it's everyone, to start seeing it where it isn't.  People from all different levels of society are playing this game.  
  It's groups based around a cause.  If  Your something horrible people feel justified in doing horrible things to you.  Some people just like being bullies quite a few actually.
    David Lawson sounds the most dead on to me.  I just cringe watching most of the videos and posts on the web.  I see plenty of people in these videos who seem to have some mental illness.
  This is a Lord of the flies society you might be piggy.
Yes.

I guess I don't even know what you believe is happening to you as gang stalking could mean a lot of things.
I do know that when I Google gang stalking the first thing that comes up is the vice documentary.

Puppetmasters?  It's just people playing Pokemon go with other people.  An infectious game captivating the sociopaths in our societies that's all.  Also money because what fun is a game without money.  I'd take a bet on how long that guy or that one will last fun times.  Perps?  Your assuming every perp is the same your assuming they are idiots.  Actually psychopaths are quite intelligent even able to orchestrate the genocide of entire people's while the whole world watches.  How?  Make it a game make games out of people make living a game.  It's a massive social experiment to see how easily people can be made to persecute someone to death.  In essence it is the beginning of a potential new wave of eugenics.  Nope don't think it's a good idea for a society to start playing those kinds of games because it always leads to bad shit.  That being said I wasn't given a choice I'm just a rabbit in the headlights.

I don't get v2k never did what I did get was directional type speakers being used when I was outside in public.  Then someone might mention lots of psychic activity in my area and ask me if I could pick up on any voices.  The v2k stuff seems to me like something your gs want you to believe.
It gives them more power.
  I think it's directional sound and suggestion.  This is just my experience.  Also mental illness is a real possibility.  No doubt lots of people are in fact just mentally ill and latching onto gs.
Probably more gang stalkers post pretending to be a TI than actual TI's.  Then you have many mentally ill people.  At the end of the day I can see why hardly anyone who is an actual TI posts much.

It is real though it's just that it's only happening to about 5 or ten percent the rest are delusional.  This shits been happening to me for about a year maybe little longer.  
You will be labeled schitzophrenic though if you seek help.  The v2k, sattelites, mind control all bs.  The truth it's vigilante justice groups, teenagers, and revenge for hire lots of groups doing this.  Part of the mobbing community. Think of it this way maybe it started as a delusion, I don't think that However with all the publicity it was just a matter of time before someone tried it out.
It's so easy to do to someone really.  I think that half the people making the crazy videos are perpetrators.  It sucks it's really happening and it happens to shcitzophrenics probably more because it's all about fucking with someone and who better to fuck with.  
It happens to loners outcasts people with no support mostly.  My experience has brought me to the conclusion I probably will kill myself.
I just dunno what to do anymore I think I'll probably off myself too.  I saught help in mental health.  The people who do this also put out a lot of disinfo.  It's not all bs just 90 percent bs.
